#summary BigTrades Summary

Big Trades is a sample box that comes with tradelink, which demostrates grey-box functionality.

It displays a list of the top ten biggest trades occuring in a stock, the time and exchange they occurated at/on.

Big Trades is included in the default install of TradeLink, in the Box Examples.dll file.  

You can download the source code from the files section of this website if you want to customize it for your own needs.

[http://code.google.com/p/tradelink/source/browse/trunk/Box-Examples/BigTrades.cs  You can also checkout the source code live online to see how simple it is.]
